description: The two groups should only leave their homes for a maximum of two hours a day, under limited circumstances.
title: Coronavirus: Over 65s and 'vulnerable' people in Jersey must self-isolate
title_page: Coronavirus: Over 65s and 'vulnerable' people in Jersey must self-isolate - BBC News
maintext: "I must stress to those affected that this is for your own safety, and it requires all of us to ensure that we keep our distance and practice good hygiene, so we don't take the infection into your homes."
